description:
A CGS mechanic who originally specializes in mobile worker maintenance. He strongly sympathizes with Orga and the others.
2nd season:The mechanic who manages Tekkadan`s maintenance crew. Though he previously had a hard time maintaining unfamiliar mobile suits, his mechanical knowledge has increased thanks to technical support from Teiwaz, and he now issues precise instructions in the hangar. Quietly watching over Tekkadan as an adult, he is their reliable "Old Man."
Source: en.gundam.info
name: Nadi Yukinojou Kassapa
